body_html: By "the email you got" you mean the real email you received to confirm your real mentorship? Bummer. I hoped it only was a Factory-problem. Anyway, after your commit, the issue is still there when I create user seeds with FactoryGirl.
body_text: By "the email you got" you mean the real email you received to confirm your real mentorship? Bummer. I hoped it only was a Factory-problem. Anyway, after your commit, the issue is still there when I create user seeds with FactoryGirl.
body: By "the email you got" you mean the _real_ email you received to confirm your _real_ mentorship? Bummer. I hoped it only was a Factory-problem. Anyway, after your commit, the issue is still there when I create user seeds with FactoryGirl.
